modules.description: Provides functions for encoding and decoding fixed-point numbers using a specialized format, including serialization and deserialization routines. Works with custom data types representing fixed-point values and their encoded byte representations. Used to integrate fixed-point arithmetic into applications requiring precise numerical control and efficient data storage.

Provides functions to create and manage audio encoding contexts, encode audio data from float arrays or 16-bit PCM strings, and retrieve the number of samples processed per encoding pass. Works with audio parameters, encoding state objects, and raw audio data in float or 16-bit little-endian formats. Used to generate MP3 streams from audio buffers or raw PCM data in real-time applications.
